mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAILS (ORDER_NUMBER, COUPUNG_NUMBER, PRICE, QUANTITY, OPTION) VALUES (#{orderNumber}, #{coupungNumber}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{option})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(QUANTITY) FROM ORDER_DETAILS WHERE COUPUNG_NUMBER = #{coupungNumber}
SELECT COUPUNG_NUMBER FROM ORDER_DETAILS GROUP BY COUPUNG_NUMBER ORDER BY SUM(QUANTITY) DESC LIMIT 5
